definitions.definition: A device that produces and radiates heat , typically to raise the temperature of a room or building.
examples: Turn on the heater ; I'm cold.

definitions.definition: A person who heats something, for example in metalworking .

examples: The thug pumped two rounds from his heater into her.

definitions.definition: A fastball , especially one thrown at high velocity.
examples: Jones threw a heater under his chin.
Emmy went on a heater in Las Vegas and came back six thousand dollars richer.

definitions.definition: A medieval European shield having a rounded triangle shape like a clothes iron.
A dead heat ; a race in which two or more competitors reach the finish line simultaneously .
Synonym of banger ( “ powerfully energetic or very good song ” ) .

main_definition: A device that produces and radiates heat , typically to raise the temperature of a room or building.
secondary_definitions: A person who heats something, for example in metalworking .
( baseball , slang ) A fastball , especially one thrown at high velocity.
( gambling , slang ) An extended winning streak.
( historical ) A medieval European shield having a rounded triangle shape like a clothes iron.
( horse racing ) A dead heat ; a race in which two or more competitors reach the finish line simultaneously .
( slang ) Synonym of banger ( “ powerfully energetic or very good song ” ) .
